p:
Unforced variability in GMST can result from an internally generated change in the net exchange of heat between the ocean and atmosphere
35– 38 and/or from an internally generated change in Earth’s top-of-atmosphere (TOA) energy budget
6, 39, 40 . Therefore, insight on the physical explanations for unforced GMST variability can be gained by investigating lagged regression coefficients (cross-regressions) between GMST and the net anomalous downward TOA energy flux (↓N) as well the net anomalous upward surface energy flux (↑Q) ( Fig. 2).
